metadata.title: YouTube Playlist Analyzer - Get Total Duration & Stats
metadata.description: Instantly calculate the total duration of any YouTube playlist. See total time, average video length, and playback times at different speeds.
metadata.keywords: youtube playlist length, playlist duration, youtube calculator, video playlist time

page.heading: YouTube Playlist Analyzer
page.description: Paste a YouTube playlist ID or URL below to instantly find out its total length and other cool stats.

form.placeholder: Paste YouTube Playlist URL or ID

tooltip.emptyInput: Please enter a Playlist URL or ID
